he Bonn challenge on 150 million ha of restored forest in 2020 and e.g. the trillion
tree campaign launched by the World Economic Forum in 2020), has prompted intense discussions on

. Sectoral studies that are able to
deal with local circumstances and limits
stimated for the USA an additional 20% sequestration rate from tree planting to achieve full stocking

could be sequestered between now and 2050
